TEXT.TITLE: FIREMAN'S FUND CORP <FFC> 3RD QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Shr 3.71 dlrs vs 95 cts Net 233.8 mln vs 62.8 mln Revs 997.8 mln vs 938.0 mln Nine mths Shr 5.06 dlrs vs 2.24 dlrs Net 327.2 mln vs 148.0 mln Revs 3.00 billion vs 2.70 billion NOTE: Realized investment gains net of taxes for 1987 3rd qtr and nine mths were 147.0 mln dlrs and 271.0 mln dlrs, respectively. Realized investment gains for 1986 3rd qtr and nine mths were 18.6 mln dlrs and 33.6 mln dlrs, respectively. Company repurchased 1.2 mln shares of its stock during the 1987 3rd qtr. Reuter
